answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Problems related to sleeping disorders, metabolic disorders or cardiac disorders can produce symptoms of sleep problems, headache, fatigue and weakness. Sleeping disorders like obstructive sleep apnea can produce inadequate sleep, trouble breathing, sweating and headaches. Metabolic disorders like diabetes or anemia can cause these symptoms. So for proper evaluation you will need to consult your primary care physician who will examine you and may ask for some blood tests to initiate appropriate therapy.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: yawn a lot all dayfatigueweaknessheadachessdisturbed sleeping...shall i do a full blood test? im 18yrs male
title: anemia symptoms
